content: **skill level ** beginner **yarn requirements ** * bernat® handicrafter cotton solids 50 g/1 75 oz or ombres 42 5 g/1 5 oz **5 balls** *or* * lily® sugar n cream® solids 70 9 g/2 5 oz or ombres 56 7 g/2 oz **3 balls** *or* * lily® sugar n cream® super size solids 113 g/4 oz **2 balls** or ombres 85 g/3 oz **3 balls** video tutorial 1 **was also available at ** * michaels 2 as crochet market bag now on the internet archive this pattern may also be called string bag or cotton string bags or market bag #228 note yarnspirations has erroneously shown this photo on another knit market bag pattern with a rounded bottom this bag has a rectangular bottom & is crocheted 1 https //www yarnspirations com/video-y-crochet-a-market-bag html 2 https //web archive org/web/20111108213928/http //www michaels com/lily%c2%ae-sugar-%c2%91n-cream-crochet-market-bag/e06628 default pd html
